definition: Five Sacred Mountains of the Daoists, namely: Mt Tai 泰山[Tai4 Shan1] in Shandong, Mt Hua 華山|华山[Hua4 Shan1] in Shaanxi, Mt Heng 衡山[Heng2 Shan1] in Hunan, Mt Heng 恆山|恒山[Heng2 Shan1] in Shanxi, Mt Song 嵩山[Song1 Shan1] in Henan
five/5
high mountain/highest peak of a mountain ridge
surname Yue

sentences.english: Three cups spit promise, the five mountains fall into light.
sentences.chinese: 三杯吐然諾，五嶽倒爲輕。

sentences.english: For example, Tai Mountain is called "East Yue" as it is the easternmost one of the five.
sentences.chinese: 如泰山是五嶽中最東的一座，因而名爲東嶽。

sentences.english: Mountains of sword send justice alliance, and the teaching counter.
sentences.chinese: 五嶽劍派組成正義聯盟，與魔教抗衡。

sentences.english: Taishan is one of five mountains, the ancient name "Zong", the beginning of Spring and Autumn Period, said Tarzan.
sentences.chinese: 泰山是五嶽之一，古名“岱宗”，春秋時始稱泰山。

sentences.english: Li said that "three cups of spit promise, back to Light Five Sacred Mountains."
sentences.chinese: 李白說“三杯吐然諾，五嶽倒爲輕。”

sentences.english: The voice resounded across the heavens.
The Huangshan Mountain is very famous in China.
sentences.chinese: 引導學生說出中國的五嶽名山。

sentences.english: Five Mountains in China, and once called the West Mountain in ancient times.
sentences.chinese: 它是中國五嶽之一，在古代被稱爲西嶽。

sentences.english: Today I would like to introduce Mount Tai, the most revered one of China's five sacred mountains.
sentences.chinese: 今天我向各位介紹號稱我國五嶽之首的泰山。

sentences.english: Mount Tai in Shandong province is one of China's five sacred mountains.
sentences.chinese: 泰山在山東是中國五嶽之一。

sentences.english: Nanyue mountain is one of the five most famous mountains in China .
sentences.chinese: 它是中國五嶽之一，在古代被稱爲西嶽。

sentences.english: Ask for the five sword spirit griffin to why.
sentences.chinese: 反問五嶽劍派上靈鷲來爲何。

definition: high mountain/highest peak of a mountain ridge
surname Yue
mountain/hill/lofty mountain
outstanding people/water and fire (in Daoist writing)
(archaic) the four rivers (Yangtze 長江|长江[Chang2 Jiang1], Yellow 黃河|黄河[Huang2 He2], Huai 淮河[Huai2 He2], Ji 濟水|济水[Ji3 Shui3])/(TCM) acupuncture point SJ-9
The Southern Heavenly Gates/a name for a mountain pass gate in several places
mist
Mt Heng in Shanxi, northern mountain of the Five Sacred Mountains 五嶽|五岳[Wu3 yue4]/Hengshan district of Jixi city 雞西|鸡西[Ji1 xi1], Heilongjiang
Lü Dongbin (796-), Tang Dynasty scholar, one of the Eight Immortals 八仙[Ba1 xian1]
underground palace of ghouls, e.g. Asgard of Scandinavian mythology
authority/prestige/supernatural spirit
the Great Wall
marble pillar (ornamental column in front of places, tombs)
vast spirit/nobility of spirit
ancestral hall/temple to one's forebears
Longsha district of Qiqihar city 齊齊哈爾|齐齐哈尔[Qi2 qi2 ha1 er3], Heilongjiang
Mt Tai 泰山 in Shandong, one of the Five Sacred Mountains 五嶽|五岳[Wu3 yue4]
